source.ee081fad: ## <font color=red>Of the 150k wine reviews, how many recieved a perfect score (100 points)? </font>
source.688f6ea9: ## <font color=red>What country had the most wine reviews?</font>
source.4445a793: The wines that got the most perfect scores was the Syrah, Merlot, Muscat, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Chardonnay.
source.6f1ec5b4:
# <font color=pink>Data Exploration on Wine Dataset</font>
 
 Hello!

As a recent wine enthusiast and hopefully future data scientist I was excited to come across this dataset! 
 
 I am curious to explore the different results of 150k wine reviews with variety, location, winery, price, and description. Lets get started!
source.2bff2d1e:
## <font color=green>Organizing the Data</font>

We want to get the top 5 countries, varieties, and wineries
source.3ef7da3f: ## <font color=red>What was the price of the majority of wines reviewed?</font>
source.cc521d79: ## <font color=red>Is there a correlation between wine scores and price?</font>
source.feafc59e: Most of the wines reviewed were around $20
source.684e1103: The top country that got the most reviews was the US then Italy then France. One could argue that the US could be at the top simply because of the convience of location if the critics lived in the US.
source.409e3a31: ## <font color=red>What was the most reviewed type of wine?</font>
source.d6ad5f81: The best wines were more than $300, even reaching up to $1400. The cheapest best wine was $65 and was a Syrah (type of red wine).
source.68cd56ec: The wines with the best reviews were found in the US
source.8bf70b0c: ## <font color=red>Of the best wines, which were the cheapest and what kind were they? </font>
source.f470a91f: There were 24 wine reviews given 100 points. These were the best of the best wines rated.
source.fe3f6155: ## <font color=red>What winery had the most reviews?</font>
source.f661072f: ## <font color=red>Of the best wines, what country did a majority of them belong to?</font>
source.eb59736a: Williams Selyem winery had the most reviews.
source.cc1ef886: ## <font color=green>Gather Data Based on Points Given</font>
source.7114108f: The most reviewed wine was Chardonnay.
source.4b3d2018: ## <font color=red>Of the best wines, what kind of wine were they? </font>
